title: Local news learns to love the arts again
description: Local arts and culture coverage as we’ve known it is all but non-existent in local news platforms. It was among the first topics on the chopping block amid consolidation and “vulture capitalization” of local news in the early days of digital. It was in need of innovation, to be sure, but it was cut before...
